titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the price of victuals within the verge of the court
Proclamations. 1613-11-05
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Whitehall the fifth day of Nouember in the eleuenth yeere of our reigne ..
